title: Ticket #2483: condor_advertise causes confusing message in collector log
description:
Whenever condor_advertise -tcp is used, this causes one instance of the following scary log message: 

   09/20/11 16:37:13 DaemonCore: Can't receive command request from 144.92.180.5 (perhaps a timeout?)

This is expected and should be harmless, but it is confusing to anyone trying to assess the health of the system.
